episodes.title: When your Jehovah’s Witnesses ‘father’ says you’re dead to them for shaming his religion.
episodes.description:
Shaming his religion for taking a Jehovah’s Witnesses ministerial servant to prison for 9 years of sexual assault. 
But even then I have tried contacting the elders for the hospital. So do I give up and walk away recognising he’s chosen 8 men (governing body) to dictate his relationship with me? 7 years he’s refused to have anything to do with me and now he’s moved without saying. #csa #JWs #shunning #unchristian #cruel

episodes.title: The truth about how Jehovah’s Witnesses treat you if you just leave.
episodes.description: Warning covers #csa and the truth about Jehovah’s Witnesses and how they treat people who leave because they don’t agree with them having  covered it up #csa instead of going to the police about a child abuser. My father helped the molester become a ministerial servant while this person was molesting children. How come the Holy Spirit didn’t tell my dad what this person was like? Was god asleep.
